textBox.richText: A late season storm was heading towards Colorado...WP was supposed to get more than a foot. I took off thursday night after Max’s play, and hit WP. CRAZY drive...not many folks on the road, but I had to clear ice off the wipers multiple times. Friday brought 10” before the lifts opened, and then another 6” during the day. It got VERY windy after lunch...I barely made it back to the C-lot as all the lifts were shutting down. Saturday was glorious...awesome laps through Belle. The blues over at Vasquez still had 1+ feet of powder...and cruising through Buckaroo trees was awesome.
